official_title: A bill to amend the National Traffic and Motor Vehicle Safety Act of 1966 and the Motor Vehicle Information and Cost Savings Act to authorize appropriations for fiscal years 1988 and 1989.
short_title: National Traffic Safety and Motor Vehicle Information and Cost Savings Authorization Act of 1987

summary.text: National Traffic Safety and Motor Vehicle Information and Cost Savings Authorization Act of 1987 - Title I: Traffic and Motor Vehicle Safety - Amends the National Traffic and Motor Vehicle Safety Act of 1966 to authorize appropriations for FY 1988 and 1989. Title II: Motor Vehicle Information and Cost Savings - Amends the Motor Vehicle Information and Cost Savings Act to authorize appropriations for FY 1988 and 1989.

titles.title: National Traffic Safety and Motor Vehicle Information and Cost Savings Authorization Act of 1987
A bill to amend the National Traffic and Motor Vehicle Safety Act of 1966 and the Motor Vehicle Information and Cost Savings Act to authorize appropriations for fiscal years 1988 and 1989.
